action.action-desc: Mr. Thompson of California (for himself, Mr. Newhouse, Mr. Costa, Mr. Panetta, Mrs. Axne, Mr. Garamendi, Mr. Carbajal, Mr. Huffman, Ms. DelBene, Ms. Bonamici, Mr. DeSaulnier, Mr. Blumenauer, Mr. Bera, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Ms. Eshoo, Mr. Vicente Gonzalez of Texas, Mr. Palazzo, Ms. Salazar, Mr. Valadao, Mrs. Hinson, Ms. Schrier, and Mr. Harder of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To authorize appropriations to carry out payments with respect to qualified losses of covered crops occurring in calendar year 2022, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the The Emergency Relief Program Reauthorization Act of 2022.

section.header: Qualified losses of covered crops occurring in calendar year 2022

subsection.text: The Secretary shall carry out a program to make payments—

paragraph.text: for necessary expenses related to qualified losses of covered crops occurring in calendar year 2022 in accordance with subsection (b); and
to producers of livestock, as determined by the Secretary, for losses incurred during calendar year 2022 due to drought or wildfires.

Except as provided in paragraph (2), payments to producers for qualified losses of covered crops under subsection (a) shall be administered in the same manner and under the same terms and conditions as payments made under the heading Department of Agriculture—Agricultural Programs—Processing, Research and Marketing—Office of the Secretary in the Extending Government Funding and Delivering Emergency Assistance Act (Public Law 117–43).

subparagraph.text: Payments under subsection (a) shall apply to—

clause.text: qualified losses of covered crops occurring in calendar year 2022; and
losses of livestock incurred during calendar year 2022 due to drought or wildfires.

subparagraph.text: With respect to payment limitations applied for losses described in subsection (a), the Secretary shall apply separate payment limitations for losses occurring in calendar year 2022.

subsection.text: There is authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section such sums as may be necessary.

paragraph.text: The term covered crop means crops (including milk, on-farm stored commodities, crops prevented from planting in 2022, and harvested adulterated wine grapes), trees, bushes, and vines.
The term qualified loss means a—

subparagraph.text: loss of a covered crop as a consequence of a drought, wildfire, hurricane, flood, derecho, excessive heat, winter storm, freeze (including a polar vortex), smoke exposure, or excessive moisture, as determined by the Secretary; and
quality loss of a covered crop, as determined by the Secretary.

paragraph.text: The term Secretary means the Secretary of Agriculture.
